content.text:
# 1996 Emperor's Cup final__disambig_1

'''1996 Emperor's Cup Final''' was the 76th final of the Emperor's Cup competition. The final was played at National Stadium in Tokyo on January 1, 1997. Verdy Kawasaki won the championship.
Overview
Verdy Kawasaki won their 4th title, by defeating Sanfrecce Hiroshima 3â€“0  with Tsuyoshi Kitazawa, Yasutoshi Miura and Keisuke Kurihara goal.
Match details
Yasutoshi Miura Keisuke Kurihara
